prompts.trueText: I'm a High School/ University Student with a monthly allowance of RM{allowance} and monthly income of RM{income}.
prompts.falseText: I'm a High School/ University Student with a monthly allowance of RM{allowance}.

prompts.trueText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{monthlyExpenses}.
prompts.falseText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{monthlyExpenses} with RM{fixedExpenses} as my fixed monthly mandatory expenses.

prompts.text: Other than that, I usually spend RM{biggestSpendAmount} on {biggestSpend}.

prompts.TrueText: I am financially dependent and would need to rely on my parents for financial support.
prompts.falseText: I am financially independent and would need to support my own living expenses.

prompts.text: I am aiming to save an amount of RM{saveAmount} each month.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{investment} of investments.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any investments.

prompts.text: Lastly, I come from a ${householdIncomeGroup} household.

prompts.trueText: I am a Retiree and I have investments worth RM{investment} and a monthly allowance and income of RM{allowanceInvestment}.
prompts.falseText: I am a Retiree and I do not have any investments.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{epf} in my EPF account.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any EPF savings.

prompts.trueText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{totalSpendAmount}.
prompts.falseText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{totalSpendAmount} with RM{fixedSpendAmount} as my fixed monthly mandatory expenses.

prompts.text: Other than that, I usually spend RM{biggestSpendAmount} on {biggestSpend}.
I am aiming to save an amount of RM{saveAmount} each month.

prompts.falseText: I am not saving for travel.

prompts.text: I am an Adult who is currently ${employment}.

prompts.falseText: I do not have a stable income.

prompts.text: I am currently working in the ${industry} industry.

prompts.trueText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{totalSpendAmount}.
prompts.falseText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{totalSpendAmount} with RM{fixedSpendAmount} as my fixed monthly mandatory expenses.

prompts.text: Other than that, I usually spend RM{biggestSpendAmount} on {biggestSpend}.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{debt} of debt/loan to pay off.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any debts or loans.
I do not have any investments.

prompts.text: I am aiming to save an amount of RM{saveAmount} each month.

prompts.trueText: I am saving up for travel.
prompts.falseText: I am not saving up for travel.
